attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is disgraceful that half my friends, all of whom are bright, intelligent people with extreme talent -all having achieved first class honours in the fine arts at slade, goldsmiths, camberwell etc, have to live off the doll to support their full time arts practise. Please can there be a better support network and funding options for practising artists in the UK? Many Thanks..
